definition: to be reborn/to recover/to come back to life/to regenerate
to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out
to repeat/to double/to overlap/complex (not simple)/compound/composite/double/diplo-/duplicate/overlapping/to duplicate
variant of 復|复[fu4]/to reply to a letter
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: A closer look at the ones that have staged comebacks suggests three ways in which they could.
sentences.chinese: 近观那些死而复生的技术，可以总结出三条原因。

sentences.english: I believe in my survival after death.
sentences.chinese: 我相信自己可以死而复生。

sentences.english: Deceased friends and relatives coming back from the dead and acting strangely.
sentences.chinese: 你过世的朋友和亲戚死而复生，行为古怪。

sentences.english: People cant dead, senior around Sun Qian body plunged into grief.
sentences.chinese: 人死不能复生，老资格搂住孙谦的遗体陷入到悲痛中。

sentences.english: According to the Christian religion,Jesus Christ resurrected from death.
sentences.chinese: 根据基督教的说法，耶稣基督曾死而复生。

sentences.english: It was the day before Easter and Peter Cottontail was very busy.
sentences.chinese: 时间是复生节之前，皮特很忙。

sentences.english: We have experienced death,we will experience resurrection.
sentences.chinese: 我们已经历死亡，将会死而复生。

sentences.english: Learn basic first aid and C. P. R.
sentences.chinese: 学习基本的急救和心肺复生术。

sentences.english: Judgment Day comes. The dead are resurrected.
sentences.chinese: 在审判日当天，亡者复生。

sentences.english: Glyph of Renewed Life - All stats increased by 5% for 1 min when you Reincarnate.
sentences.chinese: 当你复生后一分钟内所有属性提高5%。

sentences.english: It is a legendary story describing a pair of young people who died for love and relived from love.
sentences.chinese: 它讲述了一对青年男女因爱死而复生的传奇故事。
骨复生可纠正这种变化。

sentences.english: It’s like you are back from the dead.
sentences.chinese: 好像你是死而复生似的。
以利沙使书念妇人的儿子死而复生。

sentences.english: Johnson sister praising Shenghai sent back by clouds cake, hear.
sentences.chinese: 娇姐大赞升海送来的云片糕，被复生听到。

sentences.english: Two old trees overlapped their upper branches.
sentences.chinese: 那两棵古树的上端分枝相互交搭复生。

definition: to be reborn/rebirth
reincarnation (Buddhism)
reincarnation or transmigration (Buddhism)
to bring back to life
to die
lit. reincarnated in sb else's body (idiom); fig. a discarded or discredited idea returns in another guise
soul
to return from the grave/(old) to recycle (waste products)
to checkmate (in chess)/to be about to die
corporeal body
soul/mind/idea
to rise from the dead (idiom); fig. an unexpected recovery
blood sacrifice/animal sacrifice (to a God or ancestral spirit)
see 隕落|陨落[yun3 luo4]
to fall down/to decay/to fall from the sky/to die
lit. the soul flies away and scatters (idiom)/fig. to be frightened stiff/spooked out of one's mind/terror-stricken
